# AfyaTrack KE Server Configuration
# Generated by Ansible - Bonus Task

[Application]
APP_NAME=AfyaTrack KE
APP_VERSION=1.0.0
ENVIRONMENT=production

[Server]
CONFIGURED_BY=Ansible
CONFIGURATION_DATE={{ ansible_date_time.iso8601 }}
DEVOS_GROUP=devops
DEVOS_USER=devops

[Services]
POSTGRESQL_VERSION={{ postgres_version }}
NGINX_VERSION=latest

[File_Permissions]
CONFIG_FILE=/opt/config.txt
OWNER={{ devops_user }}
GROUP={{ devops_group }}
PERMISSIONS=664

[Paths]
APP_DIRECTORY=/opt/afyatrack-ke
CONFIG_DIR=/opt
